name: Billfold Wallet (Brown)
description:
Traditional bill-fold closure design with one large cash pocket and four card pockets easily accommodating 8-10 cards, while still maintaining a slim profile.

Made with 100% vegetable tanned goatskin leather from US Farms. As well as Irish linen thread.

Care, craftsmanship, and attention to detail are put into every handmade & hand sewn item.

Handmade in the USA by the Craftmen

All dimensions are approximate.
4-1/4" x 3-1/4" x 1/2"

name: Travel Wallet with Field Notes (Brown)
description: A wallet/organizer for the individual on the go. The design completely incases a Field Notes 3-1/2" x 5-1/2" journal inside, while also holding your Cap-O-Matic Fisher Space Pen on the spine. On the back of the design is a snap-closure pocket large enough for a passport as well as cash, and other misc. items. Additionally on the back side is a 2-1/8" opening easily accommodating 6 cards. Made with 100% vegetable tanned goatskin leather from US Farms. As well as Irish linen thread. A Silver Cap-O-Matic Fisher Space Pen is included with purchase. For more info visit www.spacepen.com A 3 pack of your choice of Field Notes 3-1/2" x 5-1/2" journal is included with purchase. For more info visit www.fieldnotesbrand.com Care, craftsmanship, and attention to detail are put into every handmade & hand sewn item. Handmade in the USA by the Craftmen All dimensions are approximate. Outside: 5-1/8" x 6-1/8" x 3/4" Inside Pocket: 3-7/8" x 5-7/8"

name: Phone Sleeve/Case (Brown)
description:
Phone sleeve with single card pocket. Will easily accommodate 6-8 credit cards. (Made to fit iPhone 3-4 models)

Made with 100% vegetable tanned goatskin leather from US Farms. As well as Irish linen thread.

Care, craftsmanship, and attention to detail are put into every handmade & hand sewn item.

Handmade in the USA by the Craftmen

All dimensions are approximate.
3-1/4" x 5-3/8" x 1/2"

name: Money Loop Wallet (Brown)
description:
A folding wallet with 3 card pockets and a money loop on the inside. Each card pocket will easily accommodate 3-5 credit cards. Holds folded cash for quick access using a band of leather while keeping a very slim profile. 

Made with 100% vegetable tanned goatskin leather from US Farms. As well as Irish linen thread.

Care, craftsmanship, and attention to detail are put into every handmade & hand sewn item.

Handmade in the USA by the Craftmen

All dimensions are approximate.
3" x 4-1/8" x 1/2"

name: Comb Sleeve (Brown)

A Kent A 2t comb is included with purchase. For more info visit www.kentbrushes.com Care, craftsmanship, and attention to detail are put into every handmade & hand sewn item.
